description: This file defines the Polymer behavior 'IronCheckedElementBehavior' which provides properties and methods for a custom element with a 'checked' state, including validation and toggling features. It imports Polymer and related behaviors, and registers the behavior for use in Polymer elements.

methods.name: _getValidity
methods.description: Returns false if the element is required and not checked, true otherwise.

methods.name: _requiredChanged
methods.description: Updates the 'aria-required' attribute based on the 'required' property.

methods.name: _checkedChanged
methods.description: Updates the 'active' state and 'value' when 'checked' changes, and fires 'iron-change' event.
